Articles.Article: Tucked away in beautiful Goa, is a publishing house named CinnamonTeal, co-founded by this year's winner of the YCE award. They offer a variety of services to new authors, starting with help to design and layout abook, through publishing it and providing marketing services afterwards.

Article.title: Nobel Prize Winner for Literature 2010: Mario Vargas Llosa

Articles.Article: "I am very grateful to have received this privilege" is how this year's Nobel Prize winner for literature, reacted to the news of his winning the biggest prize on earth for writing. "The truth is, I did not expectit."

Critically acclaimed and prize winning author and journalist who lives in the United States but who is a citizenof the world. She announces her work, on her website, as the investigation of how science and politics collides in a lop-sided world.
